item.title: Deployment
item.description: 最简单的 nginx 测试服务 apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: nginx spec: replicas: 1 selector: matchLabels: app: nginx template: metadata: labels: app: nginx spec: containers: - name: nginx image: nginx --- apiVersion: v1 kind: Service metadata: name: nginx labels: app: nginx spec: type: ClusterIP ports: - port: 80 protocol: TCP name: http selector: app: nginx
